subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor!
body:
On 5/8/07, Spielas Alan  wrote:
> Donny Bravo  wrote:
>
> > The Wuthering Heights star - who lives in the South Hams peninsula on
> > the Devon coast - has installed CCTV cameras on a nearby beach so she
> > can spy on the public thoroughfare, according to British newspaper
> > Mail On Sunday.
>
> Well, if it's a nude beach, then the cameras sound like a good idea to me.
>
> |>oug

Only if they're webcams.

-- 
pDale Campbell
"I'm watchin' the watchers, Jerry!"
